# githubcrypt_encrypted_environment_secret (Data Source)

This data source encrypts a secret with the public key of a GitHub repository environment.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `public_key_base64` (String) The public key of the GitHub repository environment encoded in Base64
- `secret` (String) The secret to encrypt.

### Read-Only

- `secret_encrypted_base64` (String) The encrypted secret in base64.
